byline.original: By ARNALDO CORTESI Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Pres Cardenas reveals Mex is considering protest against Brit blockade
snippet: MEXICO CITY, Jan. 31--In a statement to foreign correspondents' corps today, President Lazaro Cardenas reiterated Mexico's intention to pay the expropriated oil companies the value of their properties as fixed by legal proceeedings now pending bef...

headline.main: CARDENAS PLEDGES OIL LAND PAYMENT; Sum Fixed by Courts Will Not Be Subject to Negotiation, Says Mexican President WILL SELL FUEL TO ANY ONE But Country Would Bar Sale to Belligerents if the Other American Nations Did So

lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY, Jan. 31--In a statement to foreign correspondents' corps today, President Lazaro Cardenas reiterated Mexico's intention to pay the expropriated oil companies the value of their properties as fixed by legal proceeedings now pending before the Mexican courts.
